page.title: 03FARMS AND SMALLHOLDINGS
page.content: There are 13 farms in all with 5 being arable,3 arable/beef,3 dairy/ arable & 2 arable/pigs.Also 3 smallholdings & 3 agricultural contractors; a mixture of old & modern buildings. The former are red pantiled & of soft red brick, generally used as workshops, storage for machinery & as housing for small livestock enterprises.New buildings are mainly milking parlours,silos, livestock housing,corn storage, Dutch barns,& are constructed of steel or concrete with asbestos roofs. {Livestock}includes cattle,pigs, sheep, goats, chickens & bees.{Machinery comprises tractors;lorries;forage, combine & potato harvesters;plus trailers; cultivation equipment; drills; sprayers;balers;spreaders; hay making & material handling equipment. Hay, straw, potatoes & goats milk are available as farm gate sales.
